revision.comment: [[Category:hts:Geology]], assuming (by the etymology) that "dirt" is supposed to mean "loose ungrown soil" here.
revision.text: ==Hadza== ===Etymology=== * {{suffix|hts|yamua|bee}} * Cushitic. Cf. Iraqw ''[[yaamu]]'' 'earth, ground, world' ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hts|/ʔiamuʔabeʔe/}} ===Noun=== {{hts-noun|g=f-p}} (''Note: the form after a determiner is '''''{{l|hts|yamua}}''') # dirt ===Related terms=== * [[yamuako]] [[Category:hts:Geology]]
